alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 26 at 2:09PM MST until February 26 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. The strongest winds will generally be in the higher terrain. * WHERE...Upper San Pedro River Valley, Eastern Cochise County below 5000 feet, Chiricahua Mountains and Dragoon and Mule and Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains. * WHEN...Through 4 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Blowing dust with reduced visibilities will be possible, especially near the Willcox Play in Cochise county. Travel may be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects, and tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
